Package bto.Data

Interface ApplicationDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationCSVDao
    public interface ApplicationDao
    Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing application-related operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void delete​(java.lang.String applicationId)
      Deletes an application from the data source by its ID.
      java.util.Optional<Application> getActiveApplication​(java.lang.String applicantNric)
      Retrieves the active application for a specific applicant by their NRIC.
      java.util.List<Application> getAllApplications()
      Retrieves all applications from the data source.
      java.util.Optional<Application> getApplicationById​(java.lang.String applicationId)
      Retrieves an application by its ID.
      java.util.List<Application> getApplicationsByProject​(java.lang.String projectName)
      Retrieves all applications for a specific project.
      java.util.List<Application> getApplicationsByStatus​(java.lang.String status)
      Retrieves all applications with a specific status.
      void save​(Application application)
      Saves a new application to the data source.
      void update​(Application application)
      Updates an existing application in the data source.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save​(Application application)
        Saves a new application to the data source.
        Parameters:
        application - The application to save.

      • update

        void update​(Application application)
        Updates an existing application in the data source.
        Parameters:
        application - The application to update.

      • delete

        void delete​(java.lang.String applicationId)
        Deletes an application from the data source by its ID.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The ID of the application to delete.

      • getApplicationById

        java.util.Optional<Application> getApplicationById​(java.lang.String applicationId)
        Retrieves an application by its ID.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The ID of the application.
        Returns:
        An Optional containing the application if found, or empty if not found.

      • getActiveApplication

        java.util.Optional<Application> getActiveApplication​(java.lang.String applicantNric)
        Retrieves the active application for a specific applicant by their NRIC.
        Parameters:
        applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant.
        Returns:
        An Optional containing the active application if found, or empty if not found.

      • getApplicationsByStatus

        java.util.List<Application> getApplicationsByStatus​(java.lang.String status)
        Retrieves all applications with a specific status.
        Parameters:
        status - The status to filter applications by.
        Returns:
        A list of applications with the specified status.

      • getApplicationsByProject

        java.util.List<Application> getApplicationsByProject​(java.lang.String projectName)
        Retrieves all applications for a specific project.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The name of the project.
        Returns:
        A list of applications for the specified project.

      • getAllApplications

        java.util.List<Application> getAllApplications()
        Retrieves all applications from the data source.
        Returns:
        A list of all applications.
